Document:
# Felinid
Felinids are a mutation of humans, characterized by their signature ears and tail from your favourite japanese cartoons. They have a keen sixth sense to landing and [color=#1e90ff]take 80% less damage from falling or high speed impacts.[/color] They experience less slow down when injured.
They slash with their claws instead of using their fists, dealing [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage.
Due to their [color=yellow]small stature[/color], Felinids can also [color=#1e90ff]fit into duffel bags[/color]. However, this comes at the cost of being [color=#ec3a3a]25% easier to knock down[/color].
## Ew, Hairballs
They are also capable of eating live rats, which will allow them to cough up a disgusting hairball. Be careful when touching them, as they can [color=#ffa500]cause you to vomit when held.[/color] Felinids will use this to their advantage to gross out adversaries
